main event: A UFO sighting was reported on January 6, 1950, in Kansas City, during which multiple witnesses observed a bright object in the sky that appeared to hover and emit colorful flashes.
interesting points: The object was described as cylindrical with a brilliant white color, emitting red and orange flashes., Two individuals employed at Bendix Aviation reported their sighting while leaving work, indicating a reliable source., The sighting lasted approximately 25 to 30 minutes, with the object descending and moving in a southwest direction., The first witness initially confused the object for a star before realizing it was an airborne vehicle., No photographs were available, but sketches were mentioned in the report.
witness description: Individuals employed at Bendix Aviation Corporation
